bibl.title: Restoring and Conserving Papyri.

series.title: Bulletin of the Institute of Classical Studies [London]
BICS

bibl.note: Survival of papyri. - The pap. plant. - Manufacture of pap. - Manuf. of ink. - Pens for writing. - Finding places of papyri. - Conservation of pap.-normal. - Restoration of papyri. - Fibre matching. - Materials for joining fragments. - Mounting for display. - Dr Fackelmann's methods for treatment and conservation. - Treatment of cartonnage. - Cedrium. - Conserv. of carbonized rolls. - Photogr. of papyri.
